item.title: Ravi Sawlani
item.description: By profession, I am a software developer but beyond that, I have a deep fascination for all things tech. I enjoy solving problems and making solutions accessible for everyone Being a part of open source projects is very important to me and I try and do my part as a developer in the open-source team at BrowserStack. In past, I have worked as a backend developer in SenseHawk, helped them develop a service that helps to create customizable forms and generate useful reports based on submissions made to the form.

item.title: Work From Home Setup
item.description: Background Growing as a kid in a generation where computers and laptops were not so common, I was always fascinated and wanted to surround myself with digital devices. I still remember I had my first computer when I was in fifth grade. Now working as a software developer has its advantages, one of them being, you work with cool digital devices. Setup Due to the pandemic, most of the software developers are working from home.
